div.div: Success is possible for every student. The Redmond School District has earned a well deserved reputation for strong schools that offer a wide range of opportunities for students. It is our goal that all graduates have the knowledge and skills of highly literate students; students who are college and/or career ready and have the tools necessary to be successful.

img.p: Visit our COVID-19 Resources page for updates and information for families.

li.a: Redmond School District Board of Directors Selects Dr. Charan Cline for Superintendent

div.p: Making success possible for every student.

a.span: RSD COVID-19 Update – Extended School Closure Th

img.alt:
RSD COVID-19 Update – Extended School Closure Through April 28
Thank you for your patience and support as we navigate these unprecedented times. Our district stands ready to support our students and families and would like to share this important update with you. This afternoon Oregon Governor Kate Brown announced an extension of the statewide school closure through Tuesday, April 28. During this closure, no events, meetings, activities, competitions, athletic events and practices, or planned school travel will occur. Please visit us at www.redmondschools.org for more information.

a.span: Redmond School District’s Nutrition Services Tea

img.alt: Redmond School District’s Nutrition Services Team working hard to feed kids during our statewide COVID-19 closure! 👏🏼👏🏼👏🏼 Drive up and pickup a prepackaged breakfast and lunch this week from 9:00 -10:30 am, M-F! Thank you to these team members for their dedication! #redmondschools

a.span: REMINDER: Meal Distribution is currently happening

img.alt:
REMINDER: Meal Distribution is currently happening at Redmond High School and will end at 10:30 a.m.
Our Nutrition Services team is working diligently to deliver meals in a safe manner to ensure the safety of our team as well as those who pick up food. You can drive up to the window and access the meal without having to leave your vehicle. Please share with anyone with children 18 and under who needs food assistance and if you have individual questions please message our Facebook page!
Vern Patrick Principal @principalhesse is hosting an IG Live Story Time this evening at 7:00 pm! See her post for details and spread the word! 📚📖 💕

p.br: Redmond School District is committed to equal opportunity and non-discrimination in all of its educational and employment activities.

div.p: The District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, religion, disability or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups.
The following individuals have been designated to handle inquiries regarding non-discrimination:

p.br: Martha Hinman, Executive Director of Student Services | Email | (541) 923-8260

p.strong: District Title VI, Title IX, Age Discrimination & American Disabilities Act Contact:
p.br: Tracie Renwick, Director of Human Resources | Email | (541) 923-8922
